name: part_008
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section before Ouro Kronii's karaoke performance.
Ouro Kronii performs 'Usseewa' while receiving a foot massage.
MC section after Kronii's song, showing the score results.
MC section before IRyS's karaoke performance.
IRyS performs 'Akuma no Ko' while receiving a foot massage.
MC section after IRyS's song, showing the score and concluding the segment.

subtitles.original: I'm gonna sing "Usseewa".
subtitles.english: I'm gonna sing "Usseewa".

subtitles.original:
Alrighty, please get ready.
滝田様、またよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english:
Alrighty, please get ready.
Mr. Takita, thank you for your help again.

subtitles.original: お願いします！
subtitles.english: We're counting on you!

subtitles.original: ガチ痛い、ガチ痛い！
subtitles.english: It really hurts, it really hurts!

subtitles.original:
You're gonna... you're done, you're done.
You don't have to worry.
subtitles.english:
You're gonna... you're done, you're done.
You don't have to worry.

subtitles.original:
Yay! Okay then, let's go!
Music, start!
subtitles.english:
Yay! Okay then, let's go!
Music, start!

subtitles.original: I don't think it's gonna be that bad.
subtitles.english: I don't think it's gonna be that bad.

subtitles.original: 思い切りやっちゃって！
subtitles.english: Go all out!

subtitles.original: 正しさとは　愚かさとは
subtitles.english: What is rightness? What is foolishness?

subtitles.original: それが何か見せつけてやる
subtitles.english: I'll show you exactly what it is.

subtitles.original:
Oh, she's fine! Yes, she's fine!
She's slowly warms up.
subtitles.english:
Oh, she's fine! Yes, she's fine!
She's slowly warms up.

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh wow!
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh wow!

subtitles.original: ちっちゃな頃から優等生
subtitles.english: I've been a model student since I was small,

subtitles.original: 気づいたら大人になっていた
subtitles.english: And before I knew it, I was an adult.

subtitles.original: ナイフの様な思考回路
subtitles.english: A thought process like a knife,

subtitles.original: 持ち合わせる訳もなく
subtitles.english: Is something I've never had.

subtitles.original: でも遊び足りない　何か足りない
subtitles.english: But I haven't played enough, something is missing.

subtitles.original: 困っちまうこれは誰かのせい
subtitles.english: It's troubling, and it's someone's fault.

subtitles.original: あてもなくただ混乱するエイディー
subtitles.english: Just aimlessly confused, A-D-Y.

subtitles.original: それもそっか
subtitles.english: Well, that's that.

subtitles.original: 最新の流行は当然の把握
subtitles.english: Keeping up with the latest trends is a given.

subtitles.original: 経済の動向も通勤時チェック
subtitles.english: Checking economic trends during the commute,

subtitles.original: 純情な精神で入社しワーク
subtitles.english: Joining a company and working with a pure spirit,

subtitles.original: 社会人じゃ当然のルールです
subtitles.english: These are the obvious rules of society.

subtitles.original: はぁ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: あなたが思うより健康です
subtitles.english: I'm healthier than you think.

subtitles.original: 一切合切凡庸な
subtitles.english: Everything and anything is mediocre,

subtitles.original: あなたじゃ分からないかもね
subtitles.english: So you probably wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original:
嗚呼よく似合う
その可もなく不可もないメロディー
subtitles.english:
Ah, it suits you well,
that melody that's neither good nor bad.

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up!

subtitles.original: 頭の出来が違うので問題はナシ
subtitles.english:
The way our heads are built is different,
so there's no problem.

subtitles.original: すごーい！ わあ！ イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Incredible! Wow! Yay!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: It sounded like you were in a massage.
subtitles.english: It sounded like you were in a massage.

subtitles.original:
イェーイ！ マッサージされてる。
I feel so good! Yay!
subtitles.english:
Yay! I'm getting a massage.
I feel so good! Yay!

subtitles.original: え？ マジ？
subtitles.english: Eh? Really?

subtitles.original:
Alrighty then, the score's in again.
Let's see what you got.
subtitles.english:
Alrighty then, the score's in again.
Let's see what you got.

subtitles.original: 結果をお願いします！ ジャジャン！
subtitles.english: Let's see the results! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: Yay! Woooo!
subtitles.english: Yay! Woooo!

subtitles.original:
She got a 77.994,
that's literally a 78! That's so good!
subtitles.english:
She got a 77.994,
that's literally a 78! That's so good!

subtitles.original:
Alright, well, who's left?
Who's left?
subtitles.english:
Alright, well, who's left?
Who's left?

subtitles.original:
We only have one person left!
IRyS-chama!
subtitles.english:
We only have one person left!
IRyS-chama!

subtitles.original: はい、はい。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes.

subtitles.original: 行きなさい、早く。 はい。
subtitles.english: Go on, quickly. Yes.

subtitles.original:
Let's go, let's go!
What song are you singing?
subtitles.english:
Let's go, let's go!
What song are you singing?

subtitles.original:
I am going to be singing "Akuma no Ko"
because the world is just that cruel.
subtitles.english:
I am going to be singing "Akuma no Ko"
because the world is just that cruel.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷です。
subtitles.english: The world is cruel.

subtitles.original: 先生も本当に思い切りやってください。
subtitles.english: Teacher, please really go all out on her.

subtitles.original: 怖い... はい。
subtitles.english: Scary... yes.

subtitles.original: 優しくしてください！
subtitles.english: Please be gentle!

subtitles.original: 強くて！ 強くて！
subtitles.english: Strong! Strong!

subtitles.original: Alright, you ready?
subtitles.english: Alright, you ready?

subtitles.original: I'm scared.
subtitles.english: I'm scared.

subtitles.original:
Yes! じゃあ、ミュージック・スタート！
Woooo!
subtitles.english:
Yes! Okay, music start!
Woooo!

subtitles.original: Oh, my heart's beating.
subtitles.english: Oh, my heart's beating.

subtitles.original: 鉄の弾が正義の証明
subtitles.english: Iron bullets are the proof of justice.

subtitles.original: 貫けば英雄に近づいた
subtitles.english:
If they pierce through, they bring us closer
to becoming heroes.

subtitles.original: その目を閉じて触れてみれば
subtitles.english: If you close those eyes and try to touch it,

subtitles.original: 同じ形　同じ体温の悪魔
subtitles.english:
It's a devil with the same shape
and the same body temperature.

subtitles.original: 僕はダメで　あいつはいいの？
subtitles.english: I'm no good, but he's fine?

subtitles.original: そこに壁があっただけなのに
subtitles.english: Even though there was just a wall there.

subtitles.original: 生まれてしまった運命嘆くな
subtitles.english: Don't lament the fate of being born.

subtitles.original: 僕らはみんな自由なんだから
subtitles.english: Because we are all free.

subtitles.original: 鳥のように羽があれば
subtitles.english: If I had wings like a bird,

subtitles.original: どこへだって行けるけど
subtitles.english: I could go anywhere.

subtitles.original: 帰る場所がなければ
subtitles.english: If there's no place to return to,

subtitles.original: きっとどこへも行けない
subtitles.english: I'm sure I won't be able to go anywhere.

subtitles.original: ただただ生きるのは嫌だ
subtitles.english: I hate just simply living.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel,

subtitles.original: それでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: But I'll still love you.

subtitles.original: なにを犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I have to sacrifice,

subtitles.original: それでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: I'll still protect you.

subtitles.original: 間違いだとしても
subtitles.english: Even if it's a mistake,

subtitles.original: 疑ったりしない
subtitles.english: I won't doubt it.

subtitles.original: 正しさとは自分のこと
subtitles.english: Rightness is about yourself,

subtitles.original: 強く信じることだ
subtitles.english: It's about believing strongly.

subtitles.original: Aaaaaah...
subtitles.english: Aaaaaah...

subtitles.original:
だろ！ How was it?
How do you feel?
subtitles.english:
Right! How was it?
How do you feel?

subtitles.original:
Was it refreshing?
Refreshing, right?
subtitles.english:
Was it refreshing?
Refreshing, right?

subtitles.original:
That was great!
素晴らしい体験をさせていただきました。 痛っ...
subtitles.english:
That was great!
I was given a wonderful experience. Ouch...

subtitles.original:
Alright, I feel like the scores are in.
Shall we see?
subtitles.english:
Alright, I feel like the scores are in.
Shall we see?

subtitles.original: ジャジャン！
subtitles.english: Ta-da!

subtitles.original:
Oh! Ohhh! You did so good!
77.716!
subtitles.english:
Oh! Ohhh! You did so good!
77.716!

subtitles.original: Wooo! Yay!
subtitles.english: Wooo! Yay!

subtitles.original: And that concludes the second half.
subtitles.english: And that concludes the second half.

subtitles.original: My big toe still hurts so bad!
subtitles.english: My big toe still hurts so bad!

subtitles.original:
I know. みんな痛がってます。
滝田さん、ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english:
I know. Everyone is in pain.
Mr. Takita, thank you very much.

subtitles.original:
ありがとうございました！
痛気持ちよかったです。 バイバイ！
subtitles.english:
Thank you very much!
It was a good kind of pain. Bye bye!
